featured.text: the photos with dates and keywords help you sort them easily in your file.

definition.zh_def: 關鍵字，通常用於搜索引擎或數據庫中，以便找到相關信息的詞語或短語。
definition.en_def: A significant word or phrase used to identify or categorize content, often used in search engines or databases to retrieve relevant information.
definition.example: The article was optimized with the right keywords to improve its visibility online.
